test.query: SELECT count() FROM numbers(2_000_000) WHERE NOT ignore(hex(materialize(randomString(8))))
SELECT count() FROM numbers(2_000_000) WHERE NOT ignore(hex(materialize(randomString(16))))
SELECT count() FROM numbers(2_000_000) WHERE NOT ignore(hex(materialize(randomString(32))))
SELECT count() FROM numbers(2_000_000) WHERE NOT ignore(hex(materialize(randomString(64))))
SELECT count(unhex(materialize(hex(randomString(8)) || hex(randomString(8, 1)) || hex(randomString(8, 2)) || hex(randomString(8, 3))))) FROM numbers(2_000_000)

SELECT count(unhex(materialize(hex(randomString(8)) || hex(randomString(8, 1)) || hex(randomString(8, 2)) || hex(randomString(8, 3) || hex(randomString(8, 4)) || hex(randomString(8, 5)) || hex(randomString(8, 6)) || hex(randomString(8, 7)))))) FROM numbers(2_000_000)
